structure.unit: LICENSING OF MOTOR VEHICLES, OPERATORS, AND TRAILERS

law.text: KRS 281.765 shall apply in the case of arrests and bail for a violation of any of the provisions of KRS 186.020 to 186.260.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2739g-64.
